item.title: Former First Brands CEO Patrick James and his brother are indicted for bilking billions from banks
item.description: Patrick James, the former CEO of bankrupt auto parts supplier First Brands Group, was indicted on federal fraud charges and arrested Thursday in Ohio ...

item.title: Here's when you'll get your tax refund from the IRS
item.description: Tax season is underway, and the IRS expects 164 million people will file returns by April 15

item.title: Average US long-term mortgage rate ticks higher, holding near lowest point in more than 3 years
item.description: The average long-term U.S. mortgage rate edged up for the second week in a row, but remains just above its lowest level in more than three years

item.title: Trump says he's instructed US officials to reopen Venezuelan airspace for commercial travel
item.description: President Donald Trump says he has informed Venezuelan leader Delcy Rodríguez that he’s going to be opening up all commercial airspace over Venezuela ...

item.title: Legal setbacks against a dam in the Amazon raise questions about Brazil's reliance on hydropower
item.description: Brazilian courts have found that the Belo Monte hydropower plant in the Amazon failed to meet environmental and social requirements
